tool.name: RTEvaluation
tool.description: Application that evaluates TPs (true positives), TNs, FPs, and FNs for an idXML file with predicted RTs.
tool.command:
RTEvaluation
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_latex: -latex #if " " in str($param_latex): "$param_latex" #else $param_latex #end if #end if #if $param_p_value_dim_1: -p_value_dim_1 $param_p_value_dim_1 #end if #if $param_p_value_dim_2: -p_value_dim_2 $param_p_value_dim_2 #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_force): "$adv_opts.param_force" #else $adv_opts.param_force #end if #end if #end if

param.name: param_latex
param.label: Indicates whether the output file format of the table should be LaTeX or CSV (default)

param.name: param_p_value_dim_1
param.label: Significance level of first dimension RT filte

param.name: param_p_value_dim_2
param.label: Significance level of second dimension RT filte

tool.help:
Application that evaluates TPs (true positives), TNs, FPs, and FNs for an idXML file with predicted RTs.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/UTILS_RTEvaluation.html
